alert.note: Alert for Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:44PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Adams, southwestern Whitman and southwestern Lincoln Counties through 415 PM PDT... At 343 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles south of Ritzville, or 23 miles northeast of Connell, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ritzville, Lind, Washtucna, Riparia, Marcellus, Batum, Tokio, Packard, Schoonover, Paha, Ralston, Pizzro, Marengo, Benge, Hooper, and Jantz. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 200 and 240. U.S. Highway 395 in Washington between mile markers 67 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
